about.headline: About Me
about.body: I am a Computer Science major at the University of Central Florida with a strong interest in software development, machine learning, and security engineering. I focus on building reliable, maintainable systems and enjoy turning complex problems into clean, user-centered solutions. Outside of coursework and projects, I am an active member of the Delta Tau Delta fraternity, which has strengthened my teamwork, leadership, and communication skills. I am looking for opportunities where I can contribute quickly, learn from experienced engineers, and grow into a well-rounded software professional.

projects.title: Net Trace
projects.description: A full-stack web app that tracks personal finance with automated insights.

projects.title: Portfolio Website (This Site)
projects.description: A sleek, data-driven portfolio with a custom design and an embedded Snake mini-game.
